moves.name: X Regen All
moves.effect: Makes all allied sync pairs gradually heal themselves.

moves.name: Draining Kiss
moves.effect: Restores the user’s HP based on the amount of damage dealt to the target.

moves.name: Lei Up!
moves.effect: Restores a bit of HP for all allied sync pairs. Returns lowered stats of all allied sync pairs to normal. Raises the Defense of all allied sync pairs.

passives.name: Healing Hand 2
passives.description: Has a moderate chance of removing all status conditions of all allied sync pairs after the Pokémon uses a move.

passives.name: Stamina Reserves 6
passives.description: Once per battle, charges the user’s move gauge by six when the user is in a pinch.

passives.name: Quick Cure
passives.description: Removes the confused, flinching, and trapped conditions from the user once during battle.
